hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT RECHARGE_ID rechargeId, FROM_PLAYER fromPlayer, FROM_ORG_SCORE fromOrgScore, FROM_CUR_SCORE fromCurScore, SCORE score, TO_PLAYER toPlayer, TO_ORG_SCORE toOrgScore, TO_CUR_SCORE toCurScore, DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, "%Y年%m月%d日%H时%i分%S秒") createTime FROM RECHARGE_RECORD WHERE 1 = 1 AND (UPPER(FROM_PLAYER) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND (UPPER(TO_PLAYER) LIKE UPPER(?)) AND (DATE_FORMAT(CREATE_TIME, "%Y年%m月") = ? OR ? = '') ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
